questions.question: Considering the overall visual appearance, what single word best describes the primary color of the product contained within the package?

Observing the bag, is the packaging transparent or opaque?
Given the image, what is the apparent size of the package, relative to everyday items?
Considering the product's appearance, what single word might describe its overall consistency?
